headline: Provider Enhancement + Context Continuity
entries: Codex speed-tier routing: fast (codex-spark) for review/QA, full (gpt-5.3-codex) for planning/implementation
Persistent provider sessions with previous_response_id chaining for Codex Responses API
Anthropic prompt caching: stable prefix hash invalidated on commit
Session context inheritance via inherit_from param on session.create
MCP resources: clawd:// URI scheme exposes sessions, tasks, messages, and repo files
Ambient file watcher: watch.suggestion events on TODO/FIXME or active task path matches
Analytics budget RPC: token spend vs monthly cap with warning/exceeded thresholds
SQLite auto-backup before migrations to backups/clawd-{version}.db
Recovery mode: --no-migrate flag skips migrations; daemon.status reports recoveryMode

headline: Production Launch
entries: First public release of the clawd daemon
17 JSON-RPC methods, 7 push events over WebSocket
Full session management: Claude Code and Codex provider runners
Git integration with repo intelligence and drift detection
SQLite-backed sessions, messages, tool calls, and analytics
MCP server: tools/list and tools/call for external AI clients
Multi-account pool with automatic tier-based switching
Self-update via GitHub Releases with rollback-on-crash
GitHub Actions CI: Linux + macOS binaries
